channel.title: HybridzFate Dev Team [PI] <3
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/doxkau.png[/img] [i]Eh. Started a '07 projects before - didn't care for it. Released what I did. <3 So, starting what everyone wants. [b]P[/b]roject [b]I[/b]nsanity. Don't flame, I just started on this. Could look familiar to some releases. >.> Dev Forums: http://www.hybridzfate.eu.pn If you don't want the link there, Mod remove it. (: [/i]
[b]- Features - [/b] [code] - Full Duel Arena ( Added Forfeiting ) - Full Warriors Guild ( Dragon Defender ) - Full Tzhaar Pits - Full Barrows - Full Pest Control (Tweaked) - Added Vote4Cash (Not even hard, lawl.) - Added Full Brimhaven dungeon. - Added Dungeoneering Skill (Skill ID, working on Portals/Floors/Bosses) - Added all 3 Strykeworms, Jungle Demon (Highered HP so he's harder - greater rewards), BarrelChest boss (Drops Anchor - great stats so people actually PK/Risk it. (;) - Added FIXED Skill Area, so it doesn't have that same old ugly interface with the 5 skills. Fixed it show it shows ALL skills. - Added/Fixed High Alching - now fit to perfection. Working timers with real Anim's/GFX as RuneScape today. - Fixed/Added All Enchants (With Anim's, Ruby Necklace gives you Strength Ammy, Emerald Rings give you Ring of Duellings) - Changed RFD Minigames' bosses (Fixed up so where it's not as easy to get Barrows gloves'.) - Added the rest of the Summoning Pouches. - Fixed the Range bug, to where you can shoot from a distance. (Credits to Emtrescue) [/code] [b] What I'm working on:[/b] [code] - Fixing the ENTIRE Modern Magic book. (Even spells such as stun, so they lower the enemies' strength/attack/defence.) - Start on Lunars' Spell Book (Plank Making, etc.) - Fixing Global Gates, (most that I know of.) - Adding New Agility arenas, especially the one in the Wilderness. - Adding Dungeoneering Minigame FULL. Already have the Skill/Tokens/Shop, adding Floors. Already have the area scaled out! (Not doing it by ripping from another, making it my own custom area.) - Fixing the Jad bug (No idea how to do, Jad's model is messed up. He's invisible. :/) - Fixing Magic Spells, so you can mage from a distance. - Adding Keldagrim Map Data, and making Home area there - planning on adding new shops. - Fixing Economy completely, as in you get Dragon Scim from beating Jungle Demon, DDS from beating Spirit Tree, etc. Make it more like RS. Don't flame.. It's just a plan. - Fix Ancient Prayers (Protects don't work :l Supposedly an easy fix, not sure.) [/code] There's more. Just can't think of it all. I'm doing it ALL ON MY OWN. Not ripping from another, and not using Tutorials. >.> It may be easier, but I'd rather do it my way. I'm just saying.
[b]Media:[/b] Coming shortly.
Looking for Dev team, kind of why I posted! [b]What I'm looking for:[/b] [code] Web Designer: 0/2 - Looking for vBulletin Programmers; Currently using SMF. GFX Designer: 0/2 - I did most stuff myself, but.. Need some better ones. Looking for someone that can do GIF advertisements. Server Coders: 0/2 - Main stuff I got, if I need someone there. You're mainly just my help guide. If I need anymore people, I'll list. [/code]
[b]Credit Time:[/b] - Releaser of HybridzPvP - Gabbe (FormationX) - LoveandPower (Webclient<3you.) - Sigil (I think is his name, for fullscreen client.) - Emtrescue (Bowfix.)

item.title: HybridzFate Dev Team [PI] <3
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“ApocalypseX, post:6, topic:402194”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=499247.msg3650957#msg3650957 date=1309727873]

I could help out with being the web designer. I love working with HTML/CSS/PHP/JS. It’s just my thing!

If you happen to just give me some basics of vBulletin, I don’t even KNOW where to start. LOL. I’d just happen to love you forever. [:

Good luck sounds like you want to go far with this.

Eh. Kind of do. If it doesn’t, I’ll release what I added/fixed. ;p

I’ve worked with vBulletin before and I’d be glad to help you out. Let me know what you need.
[/quote]
Sent a PM (;[/quote]
Answered that PM.

Read full topic

item.title: HybridzFate Dev Team [PI] <3
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:


Eh. Started a '07 projects before - didn’t care for it. Released what I did. <3
So, starting what everyone wants. Project Insanity.
Don’t flame, I just started on this. Could look familiar to some releases. >.>
Dev Forums: http://www.hybridzfate.eu.pn
If you don’t want the link there, Mod remove it. (:

- Features - 

- Full Duel Arena ( Added Forfeiting )
- Full Warriors Guild ( Dragon Defender )
- Full Tzhaar Pits
- Full Barrows
- Full Pest Control (Tweaked)
- Added Vote4Cash (Not even hard, lawl.)
- Added Full Brimhaven dungeon.
- Added Dungeoneering Skill (Skill ID, working on Portals/Floors/Bosses)
- Added all 3 Strykeworms, Jungle Demon (Highered HP so he's harder - greater rewards), BarrelChest boss (Drops Anchor - great stats so people actually PK/Risk it. (;)
- Added FIXED Skill Area, so it doesn't have that same old ugly interface with the 5 skills. Fixed it show it shows ALL skills.
- Added/Fixed High Alching - now fit to perfection. Working timers with real Anim's/GFX as RuneScape today.
- Fixed/Added All Enchants (With Anim's, Ruby Necklace gives you Strength Ammy, Emerald Rings give you Ring of Duellings)
- Changed RFD Minigames' bosses (Fixed up so where it's not as easy to get Barrows gloves'.)
- Added the rest of the Summoning Pouches.
- Fixed the Range bug, to where you can shoot from a distance. (Credits to Emtrescue)


What I’m working on:

- Fixing the ENTIRE Modern Magic book. (Even spells such as stun, so they lower the enemies' strength/attack/defence.)
- Start on Lunars' Spell Book (Plank Making, etc.)
- Fixing Global Gates, (most that I know of.)
- Adding New Agility arenas, especially the one in the Wilderness.
- Adding Dungeoneering Minigame FULL. Already have the Skill/Tokens/Shop, adding Floors. Already have the area scaled out! (Not doing it by ripping from another, making it my own custom area.)
- Fixing the Jad bug (No idea how to do, Jad's model is messed up. He's invisible. :/)
- Fixing Magic Spells, so you can mage from a distance.
- Adding Keldagrim Map Data, and making Home area there - planning on adding new shops.
- Fixing Economy completely, as in you get Dragon Scim from beating Jungle Demon, DDS from beating Spirit Tree, etc. Make it more like RS. Don't flame.. It's just a plan.
- Fix Ancient Prayers (Protects don't work :l Supposedly an easy fix, not sure.)

There’s more. Just can’t think of it all.
I’m doing it ALL ON MY OWN. Not ripping from another, and not using Tutorials. >.> It may be easier, but I’d rather do it my way. I’m just saying.

Media:
Coming shortly.

Looking for Dev team, kind of why I posted!
What I’m looking for:

Web Designer: 0/2 - Looking for vBulletin Programmers; Currently using SMF.
GFX Designer: 0/2 - I did most stuff myself, but.. Need some better ones. Looking for someone that can do GIF advertisements.
Server Coders: 0/2 - Main stuff I got, if I need someone there. You're mainly just my help guide.
If I need anymore people, I'll list.

Credit Time:

  • Releaser of HybridzPvP
  • Gabbe (FormationX)
  • LoveandPower (Webclient<3you.)
  • Sigil (I think is his name, for fullscreen client.)
  • Emtrescue (Bowfix.)

Read full topic
